programme.title: Second Shot at Love

programme.title: The Killer's Shopping List
programme.desc: It tells the story of Ahn Dae-sung, a perceptive supermarket cashier with an impressive memory, and his girlfriend Do Ah-hee trying to fight against criminals by tracking their shopping lists.

programme.title: America In Color S3
programme.desc: Visit America during the heart of the Klondike Gold Rush. See Alaska’s evolution from a frozen wasteland to becoming the 49th state. From boomtowns to volcanic blasts to Japanese invasions, this is the story of America’s last frontier.

programme.title: America In Color S3
programme.desc: In the early 20th century factories were quickly expanding and technology quickly changing. By the 1950s, American workers had the highest wages in the world, but it wasn’t an easy road. Follow the hard-won battles to achieve the American Dream.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: From the earliest days of space exploration to humankind's latest endeavors, risk is always part of the equation. But for the pioneers who were the first to put NASA's unpredictable technology and unproven designs to the test, the dangers were greater.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: It's one of the most challenging and dangerous phases of space exploration: bringing a spacecraft back to Earth. For decades, NASA and Soviet engineers and designers have struggled to build machines that can withstand the unforgivable heat and unthinkable speeds caused by re-entry into our atmosphere.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: In space, there are few second chances. When something goes wrong, it's up to astronauts and Mission Control to come up with a solution together...and quickly.

programme.title: The Story Of Nintendo
programme.desc: From humble beginnings manufacturing 'Hanufuda' cards came one of the world's most recognised videogame companies and presenting itself as a platform for quality games and strong values. This is the story of Nintendo.

programme.title: KBS WORLD News Today
programme.desc: KBS World Daily English News Anchor : Choi Kyu-yeon

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover’s death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: The Trigonal: Fight for Justice
programme.desc: An international crime syndicate runs a drug-induced underground fighting tournament, where fighters become guinea pigs for experimental drugs. A retired MMA champion is forced to fight in the tournament. The syndicate thugs brutally assault his wife and kill his best friend, leaving him with no other choice but to fight for justice.

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Special Forces agent Brenner and her husband stumble upon an illegal drug compound in the woods while hiking. The drug dealers capture them, kill her husband, and leave her for dead. Not only does Brenner escape alive, she is also seething with rage and vows to hunt down all who murdered her husband and take revenge!

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: It's the penultimate commitment ceremony and, while some couples are going from strength to strength, two couples will leave the experiment - and their marriages - for good.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S4)
programme.desc: The team find a "granny home" - a house that hasn't been updated in a long time, but has good bones and shouldn't take much work to flip. But the planned one-month renovation hits some snags.

programme.title: Revenge For My Mother
programme.desc: Audrey teaches postnatal fitness to a group of mothers. However, when her recently hired assistant starts exacting revenge, Audrey's perfect world of mums and babies erupts into madness and murder.

programme.title: A Dangerous Affair
programme.desc: Pilates instructor Amelie begins a steamy affair with one of her clients, handsome journalist Pierce Dalton, only to find herself embroiled in a deadly love triangle.

programme.title: Danger In The House
programme.desc: As his mother's illness progresses, a wealthy man hires a perfect caregiver. But their lives start to spiral into a deadly affair as the caregiver tries to make herself a permanent fixture.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S16)
programme.desc: The first immunity challenge is a battle: Time Vs Ingredients. Five contestants choose between one ingredient for 90 minutes or up to 20 ingredients but only 45 minutes. Who will win immunity?

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy heads to two restaurants with huge reputations. First up is DiFara Pizza in Brooklyn, New York to learn the secrets to their famous slice. Then it's off to visit Mini Kabob in Glendale, California.

programme.title: When The Love Is Gone
programme.desc: The movie is a remake of the 1983 blockbuster movie directed by Danny Zialcita entitled Nagalit ang Buwan sa Haba ng Gabi. A gripping, moving story of love lost, love gained, love betrayed, and love unbound.

programme.title: Ben Delubyo
programme.desc: After his dismissal from the police force due to insubordination, Ben (Bong Revilla, Jr.) decides to lead a quiet life as a mechanic. But just as he is beginning to enjoy his new-found peace, his hometown is beleaguered by crimes. To help contain the problems before they are blown into unimaginable proportions, a PNP general orders a police lieutenant (Charlene Gonzales) to get him back. Indeed, he returns, but this time, as a vigilante. Ironically, his most important assignment is to collar a notorious drug lord (Ronaldo Valdez) who happens to be the father of his girlfriend (Aileen Damiles). Now, Ben is torn between protecting the woman he loves or upholding the law.

programme.title: Itutumba Ka ng Tatay Ko
programme.desc: Teteng (Janno Gibbs), a single father and assistant to a film director, faces his last days due to a brain tumor. Despite his fear of confrontation, he becomes determined to protect his daughter from bullies.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: Seven years after his failed assassination and murder of his family, Ben (Cesar Montano) seeks revenge on Mando (Ricky Davao), master of drug syndicate and white slavery.

programme.title: Praybeyt Benjamin
programme.desc: Vice plays the role of Benjamin Santos whose family has a long tradition of serving in the military. Conflict ensues when Lolo Benjamin (Eddie Garcia) found out that his grandson is gay.

programme.title: MIA
programme.desc: Mia Salazar (Coleen Garcia), a self-destructive, alcoholic doctor who joined the Doctor to the Barrios program to heal from the tragedy of her fiance's death meets the cheerful and nerdy forester Jay Policarpio (Edgar Allan Guzman). Together, the two will embark on a new journey.

programme.title: Finally Found Someone
programme.desc: Aprilyn who is left by his groom on the day of their wedding becomes viral online. Devastated, she meets Raffy who works at a PR agency hired by the father of the groom who will help her move on.

programme.title: Just A Stranger
programme.desc: A story of a woman and a man, half of her age being in love with each other despite the fact that they are both tied with someone else.

programme.title: Cry No Fear
programme.desc: Kaycee (Donnalyn Bartolome) and Wendy (Ella Cruz) are always at each other's throat. But when they are left alone in their house amidst a storm, with intruders trying to kill them, they have no choice but to become partners as they try to escape.

programme.title: Upline Downline
programme.desc: A young man struggling to support his family enters the world of multilevel marketing.

programme.title: Camp Sawi
programme.desc: A group of brokenhearted women end up at a resort that specializes in helping people ease their pain.

programme.title: Bahay na Pula
programme.desc: Jane (Julia Barretto) and her husband come home to an old ancestral house she inherited from her grandma. As days go by, they realize something evil is living with them in the house.

programme.title: Cheers S4 E08 - Love Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S4 E05 - They Do It With Mirrors (Part 1)
programme.desc: Julia McKenzie perfectly captures Agatha Christie’s iconic amateur detective - and the innocent exterior which harbours a razor- sharp mind.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S4 E06 - They Do It With Mirrors (Part 2)
programme.desc: Julia McKenzie perfectly captures Agatha Christie’s iconic amateur detective - and the innocent exterior which harbours a razor- sharp mind.

programme.title: ALF S2 E02 - Ballad of Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: Frasier S5 E23 - Party Party
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S4 E03 - Deep Shock
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: North And South Book I E02 - Episode 1 (Part 2)
programme.desc: 1842. Two West Point military academy cadets form a bond of friendship strong enough to survive the forces leading to the United States' Civil War--forces that will rip their country into North and South

programme.title: Cheers S4 E09 - From Beer To Eternity

programme.desc: Julia McKenzie perfectly captures Agatha Christie’s iconic amateur detective - and the innocent exterior which harbours a razor- sharp mind.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S4 E08 - Why Didn't They Ask Evans? (Part 2)
programme.desc: Julia McKenzie perfectly captures Agatha Christie’s iconic amateur detective - and the innocent exterior which harbours a razor- sharp mind.

programme.title: CSI S4 E13 - Suckers
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: ALF S2 E02 - Ballad of Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: Frasier S5 E23 - Party Party
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: The team is ecstatic when new scientific evidence narrows down the location of the gold signature in the Money Pit. Rick realises a lifelong dream when he finally goes underground on Oak Island.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: A cold front threatens to freeze up gator season. Troy looks for warm waters to save the day. Don mixes up a special juice to lure big gators. Joey and Zak bet everything on a set of open flood gates.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: The team launches an incredible nighttime 200-drone light show experiment above the Triangle and the East Field leading to a startling sighting in the sky and new data that points toward possible answers.

programme.title: Alone: Frozen (S1)
programme.desc: Frost arrives and changes the landscape, creating new obstacles for the participants. Some deal with the consequences of a diet with no diversity, while others battle with major shelter issues.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S3)

programme.title: History's Greatest Of All Time With Peyton Manning (S1)
programme.desc: From Evel Knievel to Harry Houdini, host Peyton Manning counts down the top ten daredevils of all time, as voted by a panel of experts. Which of these record-breaking junkies gets your heart pumping?

programme.desc: Frost arrives and changes the landscape, creating new obstacles for the participants. Some deal with the consequences of a diet with no diversity, while others battle with major shelter issues.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: Walt Disney overcomes immense obstacles to create the first theme park, where instead of thrill rides, he gives the visitor an immersive journey into a story, like the experience of being inside a movie.

programme.desc: From Evel Knievel to Harry Houdini, host Peyton Manning counts down the top ten daredevils of all time, as voted by a panel of experts. Which of these record-breaking junkies gets your heart pumping?

programme.title: Alone: Frozen (S1)
programme.desc: Frost arrives and changes the landscape, creating new obstacles for the participants. Some deal with the consequences of a diet with no diversity, while others battle with major shelter issues.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Building a wilderness survival shelter is far from simple, but it's even tougher to make it bone dry when it rains and smoke-free when a fire is lit.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: This week's challengers tackle a complicated build; crafting a working oven from all natural materials, like sand, wood and water.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S3)
programme.desc: An infamous Cold War cold case: nine hikers were found mutilated on a remote mountain slope. For over 60 years, authorities and amateurs have been trying to figure out what happened.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: In a pawn shop far away, Rick and Corey unbox a skateboard signed by Carrie Fisher. Then, Corey has a first-person encounter with "Halo: Combat Evolved". Will he be the Master Chief of this deal?

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: In the first of a five-episode event, the forge is transformed into a Gladiator's arena for a competition. In the opening, two smiths must forge a fierce Roman-era falx but only one will be crowned victor.

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: Walt Disney overcomes immense obstacles to create the first theme park, where instead of thrill rides, he gives the visitor an immersive journey into a story, like the experience of being inside a movie.

programme.title: Pati Ba Pintig ng Puso? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia was at his best as the autocratic patriarch who ruled his family and all the people around him with an iron hand. But his grandson would have none of this.

programme.title: Cuadro De Jack
programme.desc: Young comedians Nino, Keempee, Dennis and Smokey starred in this 90's remake of a blockbuster hit. The Filipino version of the cowboy and Indians war made all the more appealing by the laugh-filled sequences featuring the inept, but trying hard bunch of heroes.

programme.title: Pieta 2
programme.desc: Rigor (Ace Vergel) dies but in Marta's fear that Noel (Bong Revilla Jr) might turn out like his amoral father, she raises her son with an iron hand.

programme.title: Ober Da Bakod 2 (Da Treasure Adbentyur)
programme.desc: The Dineros and the Dayukdoks, were off on a treasure hunt where they met the crazy professor Hannibal, a forgetful ghost, a tribe of midgets, a troop of sexy women from the moon and other fantasy figures.

programme.title: Uubusin Ko Ang Lahi Mo
programme.desc: The canonigos led by Mayor Placido (Eddie Gutierrez) have enjoyed sole political control of the town for sometime now. But their abusive reign is threatened when Fortunato Guerrero (Robert Arevalo) plans to enter the political arena in the coming elections. The Guerrero and Canonigo clans both vow to eliminate the each other.

programme.title: Si Maryo O Si Goko
programme.desc: Loony William Martinez stars as your COMPU-WHACKO THRILL-SEEKER who entered into a series of hell-raising misadventures that will take the viewers to the outskirts of computer-generated fantasia.

programme.title: Working Boys
programme.desc: The wacky trio of Tito, Vic & Joey became a quartet with the addition of Bagets star, Herbert Bautista. They played jacks-of-all-trades and masters of none in this take-off from the acclaimed Working Girls.

programme.title: Jessica Alfaro Story
programme.desc: One more look at the shocking Vizconde rape and murder case. This time, from the point of view of self-confessed star witness to the crime, the controversial Jessica Alfaro.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang
programme.desc: A librarian's husband turn out to be psychotically abusive. When the husband mistakenly thinks he has killed her, he dumps her in a river. In need of help to take revenge, she hooks up with a bank robber and together they kill him.

programme.title: Bawal na Halik
programme.desc: Bawal na Halik

programme.title: Sambahin Mo Ang Katawan Ko
programme.desc: A mysterious girl descends on a fishing village and stirs up a storm by carrying on with two of the village's most coveted bachelors --- an engaged playboy and a rich seminarian.

programme.title: Kapag Wala Nang Batas
programme.desc: Gabriel (Chuck Perez) decides to enter the seminary to escape the violent world his family is involved with. But he soon realizes that he cannot totally breakout from his legacy.

programme.title: Aso't Pusa (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pamboy (Tito Sotto) risked being beaten to a pulp by Osang's father each time he came to defend the girl. He tried to convince to leave, but Osang (Aiza Seguerra) continued to show her love for her father even after he went into jail.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 8
programme.desc: Our buyers bid big to win a locker packed with what looks like rare art, but will the winner walk away with cash or counterfeits? Then, a dumpy unit sends almost everyone running, but Papa Bear spies a profit. And later, the day's final auction contains expensive looking sky-diving equipment that ignites a sky-high bidding war. But when the dust settles, the winner will unveil a hidden gem that spells a five-figure payday.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 9
programme.desc: Our buyers go head-to-head to score an item that appears to be a covered car. But when the tarp is pulled back, will the winner drive away with a pile of cash or a piece of trash? Then, the legality of a locker's contents is called into question, but Brandon and Lori take a leap of faith and are rattled by what they find. And later, Sean has saved the best for last as our buyers are given the rare opportunity to compete for unclaimed airline luggage. It's an auction of a different breed that ignites a cash spending frenzy.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 4
programme.desc: Not to boast, but we've got 20 of the World's Dumbest Show Offs and they're about to steal the show! From an out-of-control security guard to a dancer who kills it at a funeral - they all need attention, and they'll get plenty of it from our cast ofhilarious comedians, including Mike Britt, Rachel Feinstein and Gilbert Gottfried.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 03
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test a variety of hacks to find out which work best for shining your shoes, avoiding a soda can explosion, and putting wine in a blender. Plus, they'll find the most efficient hacks for home maintenance, and teach you which hacks will help combat any party animal.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 4
programme.desc: The Impractical Jokers, Sal, Joe, Murr and Q meet after the show to talk about their favorite moments during the show not to mention the most uncomfortable, most embarrassing, most humiliating and most outrageous. It is a chance for the viewers to hear about all the behind the scenes mishaps and awkward scenes as well as see outtakes never seen before.

programme.desc: Our buyers bid big to win a locker packed with what looks like rare art, but will the winner walk away with cash or counterfeits? Then, a dumpy unit sends almost everyone running, but Papa Bear spies a profit. And later, the day's final auction contains expensive looking sky-diving equipment that ignites a sky-high bidding war. But when the dust settles, the winner will unveil a hidden gem that spells a five-figure payday.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 9
programme.desc: Our buyers go head-to-head to score an item that appears to be a covered car. But when the tarp is pulled back, will the winner drive away with a pile of cash or a piece of trash? Then, the legality of a locker's contents is called into question, but Brandon and Lori take a leap of faith and are rattled by what they find. And later, Sean has saved the best for last as our buyers are given the rare opportunity to compete for unclaimed airline luggage. It's an auction of a different breed that ignites a cash spending frenzy.

programme.title: East New York S1 11
programme.desc: Killian and Morales investigate the mysterious death of a dancer found on the New York City subway tracks.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 9
programme.desc: Superman and John Henry clash over how to handle Bruno Mannheim, while Lois worries over upcoming treatments and confides in Lana about her early courtship with Clark.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 03
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test a variety of hacks to find out which work best for shining your shoes, avoiding a soda can explosion, and putting wine in a blender. Plus, they'll find the most efficient hacks for home maintenance, and teach you which hacks will help combat any party animal.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 4
programme.desc: The Impractical Jokers, Sal, Joe, Murr and Q meet after the show to talk about their favorite moments during the show not to mention the most uncomfortable, most embarrassing, most humiliating and most outrageous. It is a chance for the viewers to hear about all the behind the scenes mishaps and awkward scenes as well as see outtakes never seen before.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 4
programme.desc: Not to boast, but we've got 20 of the World's Dumbest Show Offs and they're about to steal the show! From an out-of-control security guard to a dancer who kills it at a funeral - they all need attention, and they'll get plenty of it from our cast ofhilarious comedians, including Mike Britt, Rachel Feinstein and Gilbert Gottfried.

programme.title: East New York S1 11
programme.desc: Killian and Morales investigate the mysterious death of a dancer found on the New York City subway tracks.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 10
programme.desc: A covered car lures our buyers to bid big, but the reveal could be more than the winner bargained for. Then, as the temperature climbs to the hottest day of the year, Jesse loses out to Dan on a locker full of expensive tools. But just when it lookslike Jesse is out of the race, he comes back with his biggest score yet. And later, tempers swelter as the final auction of the day pits all of our buyers in a bidding war so intense, one of them cracks under the pressure.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 11
programme.desc: The competition is off with a bang as a locker full of fishing gear sparks fast and furious bidding war that leaves the winner with a surprise catch. Then, Lori butts heads with another bidder, but is it all just a mind-game to try and steal a goldenunit? And later, Papa Bear scoops up a locker for a hefty price, but when he starts digging he quickly discovers his prize possession isn't exactly street legal.

programme.title: East New York S1 12
programme.desc: Killian’s latest case threatens to derail his personal life, Suarez has a fateful meeting with political policy advisor, and Bentley returns to work after his shooting.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 10
programme.desc: Lois attempts to interview Peia in the hopes of unearthing the truth about an old case, while Clark struggles to spend quality time with the boys.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 04
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin compete to discover the best hacks for chopping a watermelon, removing stickers from a locker and cooking pizzas. Plus, they'll prepare you for your next tailgate and for any encounter with a walking disaster.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 5
programme.desc: Murr, Joe, Sal, and Q fumble through the aisles of a grocery store, and re-gift the kooky contents of a mystery bag. Then, the guys must seek out the chosen one, in an embarrassing needle-in-a-haystack challenge.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 10
programme.desc: A covered car lures our buyers to bid big, but the reveal could be more than the winner bargained for. Then, as the temperature climbs to the hottest day of the year, Jesse loses out to Dan on a locker full of expensive tools. But just when it lookslike Jesse is out of the race, he comes back with his biggest score yet. And later, tempers swelter as the final auction of the day pits all of our buyers in a bidding war so intense, one of them cracks under the pressure.

programme.desc: Millionaire Thornton Melon’s (Rodney Dangerfield) son is a college misfit, so Thornton lends some fatherly support...by enrolling as a fellow freshman! Now, he’ll have to hit the books, instead of his bank account – or go back to being the world’s wealthiest dropout!

programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) moves into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) moves into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: Creepy Pasta
programme.desc: Trapped in an abandoned house, a young man desperately searches for clues about his trapped situation. The unsettling truth actually lies in a sequence of viral videos and they gradually corrupt his mind…

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Model Family

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: When an infant's body washes up on the shores of Deer Island, Massachusetts, residents rally to find out who she is, and what happened to her. Their unprecedented solidarity gets nationwide attention.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: Police race across three states to catch a bus carrying an alleged gunman threatening to kill everyone onboard. On the coast of Florida, a toddler fights for her life after being found face down in a pool.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Andy has worked odd jobs his entire adult life, and he considers himself an entrepreneur specialising in the reselling of scrap and junk.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: Tulsa detectives believe the victim of a shooting was a Good Samaritan who'd been robbed. But at trial, the jury must decide if his killer actually acted in fear of his own life.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: A Mobile mother goes missing after blowing millions at the casino. At trial, the DA and detective take a gamble of their own to bring her killer to justice.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. An angry defendant flips off the judge during a virtual hearing; a victim is cross-examined by her accused attacker; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. An accused stalker screams expletives at the judge; a shooting victim's mother cries for justice; an assistant prosecutor argues with the judge; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a mum fighting for custody of her kids tries to steal a court deputy's gun. A Sovereign Citizen hangs up during a virtual sentencing.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a murderous wife pleads for sympathy; a virtual DUI hearing goes from joking to screaming; a defendant's angry brother must be removed from the courtroom.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A man tells police he was pushed to the brink before murdering his wife; an A-list actor is questioned in a deadly on-set death; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A teen gives the chilling reason for why she killed her 9-year-old neighbour; a man turns himself in after committing a deadly mistake; an investigator uses her skills to get a killer to open up; and more.

programme.title: My Ghost Story Asia (S1)
programme.desc: A man sees strange things on the deadly Karak Highway. Next, souls of dead children are kept in an amulet. Later, two men are spooked at a suicide spot.

programme.title: My Ghost Story Asia (S1)
programme.desc: Actress Mandy Chen feels a spirit following her after acting as a murdered victim. Next, six flatmates are spooked. Later, a photographer captures a haunting image.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: Historical Bucks County, is alarmed when several young men vanish one after the other within a week. Detectives unearth a ruthless murder spree in this seemingly picture-perfect farming community.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A young woman is brutally attacked on the train by an assailant; a coach witnesses a student with a gun roam the hall; a store clerk faces a suspect trying to rob him with an unusual weapon.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: An auto parts store owner turns the tables on an armed assailant by taking his gun; an armoured car driver survives a terrifying attack; a hotel clerk flips the script on an armed robber. And more.

programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti elicited murder confessions from a vicious but relatively unknown serial killer — Richard Cottingham, nicknamed the Torso Killer.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A middle-aged woman holds a restaurant manager hostage. First responders hurry to locate a young woman who flipped her car. A married couple in Ohio defend themselves after an intruder enters their home.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S6)
programme.desc: A 68-year-old father shoots his daughter's boyfriend when the couple arrives at the family home. Believing his daughter is trapped in an abusive relationship, he fires three shots.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S6)
programme.desc: After a construction company boss is found shot dead, no arrests are made. An employee says he'd been bound and gagged by a gang just before the shooting. But 14 years later police charge him with murder.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Hector starts selling Rosa's delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when they're more popular than the mercado!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: With prankster Luan at camp for April Fool's Day, the Louds think they're safe. That is, until they break down in front of an unusual motel.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Hoping to win a song-writing contest, Luna contemplates whether she should go with a song that's true to her sound.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel tries to make Pudding Day at school fair for everyone, she accidentally starts a pudding apocalypse.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy invents a camera so Painter can make portraits of all the village's inhabitants.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: After Wild sprains his ankle, he stays in Papa Smurf's house to recuperate while Papa Smurf is away.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Munks help a world-famous runner design a pair of prosthetic legs for a race she's set to run in.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 22
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 3
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 3
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. programme.title: The Kasambahays S2 ep 15
programme.desc: Guia (Donnalyn Bartolome) transfers to a different neighborhood, meets new faces. New kasambahays, new masters and a whole new adventure packed with fun and laughter.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 8
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 7
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart
